title: Satisfactory Modeler SFPlus Game Data
description: Schema for game_data.json used by Satisfactory Modeler SFPlus

Tier.description: Tier the machine is unlocked in (format 'Major-Minor').

AveragePower.description: Average power consumption (negative) or generation (positive) in MW, as a string.

OverclockPowerExponent.description: Exponent used for power calculation during overclocking, as a string (can be fraction).

MaxProductionShards.description: Maximum number of Power Shards usable for production boost.

ProductionShardMultiplier.description: Production boost multiplier per shard, as a string (fraction). TODO: pattern?

ProductionShardPowerExponent.description: Exponent used for power calculation when using production shards, as a string.

Cost.description: List of parts required to build the machine.

Amount.description: Quantity of the part required, as a string.

MinPower.description: Minimum power generation (e.g., Geothermal), as a string.

BasePower.description: Base power generation before boosts (e.g., Alien Power Augmenter), as a string.

BasePowerBoost.description: Power boost multiplier (e.g., Alien Power Augmenter), as a string (fraction).

FueledBasePowerBoost.description: Power boost multiplier when fueled (e.g., Alien Power Augmenter), as a string (fraction).

MultiMachines.description: Groups of related machines or abstract concepts treated as machines (e.g., Miners, Storage).

Name.description: Unique name for the multi-machine group.

DefaultMax.description: Default maximum PPM or count, as a string (can be empty).

Machines.description: List of specific machines belonging to this group (e.g., Miner Mk.1, Mk.2).

Name.description: Name of the specific machine (must match a name in the 'Machines' list).

PartsRatio.description: Relative production rate compared to the base, as a string (number or fraction).

Default.description: Whether this is the default machine selection.

Capacities.description: List of operational modes or capacities (e.g., Node Purity, Storage State).

PartsRatio.description: Relative production/throughput rate for this capacity, as a string (number or fraction).

PowerRatio.description: Relative power generation for this capacity, as a string (fraction).

Default.description: Whether this is the default capacity selection.

Parts.description: List of all items and fluids in the game.

Tier.description: Tier the part is primarily associated with (format 'Major-Minor').

SinkPoints.description: Point value when sunk in the AWESOME Sink (0 if unsinkable).

Recipes.description: List of all crafting and resource extraction recipes.

Machine.description: Name of the machine or multi-machine group that performs this recipe.

BatchTime.description: Time in seconds to complete one crafting cycle, as a string (number or fraction).

Tier.description: Tier the recipe is unlocked in (format 'Major-Minor').

Parts.description: List of input (negative amount) and output (positive amount) parts per cycle.

Part.description: Name of the input or output part.

Amount.description: Quantity of the part consumed (-) or produced (+) per cycle, as a string (number or fraction).

Alternate.description: Whether this is an alternate recipe.

MinPower.description: Minimum power consumption for this specific recipe (overrides machine default), as a string.

AveragePower.description: Average power consumption for this specific recipe (overrides machine default), as a string.

Ficsmas.description: Whether this is a FICSMAS event recipe.
